TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataRowVersion extends System.Enum

remarks.format:
## Remarks The DataRowVersion values are used when retrieving the value found in a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> using <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A> or the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object.
The DataRowVersion informs you what version of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> exists. Versions change under the following circumstances:
- After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> method, if you change the value, the `Current` and `Proposed` values become available.
- After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.CancelEdit%2A> method, the `Proposed` value is deleted.
- After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.EndEdit%2A> method, the Proposed value becomes the `Current` value.
- After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> method, the `Original` value becomes identical to the `Current` value.
- After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> method, the `Original` value becomes identical to the `Current` value.
- After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RejectChanges%2A> method, the `Proposed` value is discarded, and the version becomes `Current`.
## Examples The following example checks the DataRowVersion of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> before invoking the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> method.
[!code-cs[Classic WebData DataRowVersion Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.data.datarowver_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRowVersion Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.data.datarowver_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowVersion Current = int32(512)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowVersion Default = int32(1536)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowVersion Original = int32(256)

Docs.summary: The row contains its original values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.DataRowVersion Proposed = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: The row contains a proposed value.
